turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks that is at 600 Eighth Avenue in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, what can I get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get a Grande Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, any additions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you make sure they don't put any whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a light version?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to make it light.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can they remove any kind of topping. I don't want the dark chocolate topping, I just want the liquid part of the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me see if they can do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, you know what, that's too much work, I want an iced pumpkin spice chai latte instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, same size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make it a grande. Also, tell them to use skim milk. And make it dirty.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Dirty?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, with a shot of expresso inside.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll get that order in for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order is in and will be ready shortly for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And my reciept?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks, have a nice day!

items.name: iced pumpkin spice chai latte instead
